home.heroTitle: Your go-to specialty store for LARP props and accessories
home.heroDescription: Whether you need smaller props or larger set pieces, you’ll find everything you need to bring your story to life.
home.categoriesDescription: We offer a wide range of supplies — from combat vests to spaceship consoles, crafting materials, fire extinguishers — and everything in between.

faq.faqDescription: Before reaching out to us, see if you can find what you're looking for in our FAQ
faq.question1: When will my booking be approved?
faq.answer1: We look through bookings as soon as we can. Bookings are usually approved within the span of 2-3 days. If you've waited longer than 5 days, send us an email
faq.question2: How long can I book items for?
faq.answer2: One booking can be a maximum duration of two weeks
faq.question3: Why do I have to be approved before booking items?
faq.answer3: We see the approval of our users as a guarantee that the items which have been lent will be returned after a maximum of 2 weeks.
